definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Such process can also release anions , which can adjust the pH of water to slight basic.
sentences.chinese: 釋放一定的負離子，調整水的酸鹼度使水呈弱鹼性。

sentences.english: And they're immersed in an electrolyte made of positive and negative ions dissolved in a solvent.
sentences.chinese: 他們被浸沒在正負離子溶於溶劑的電解液中。

sentences.english: One thing is the balance or ratio between positive and negative ions.
sentences.chinese: 一種情況是正負離子平衡問題，或比率問題。

sentences.english: The negative ions, these are electron-rich.
sentences.chinese: 二負離子，它們有富裕的電子。

sentences.english: These anions can serve as analgesia and eliminate fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 這些負離子可以起到鎮痛和消除疲勞的作用。

sentences.english: The mechanism of negative-ion-sulfurizing was also discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文還對負離子轟擊滲硫的機理進行了探討。

sentences.english: However, he plans to build channels that attract negative ions by adding positive charges to the tube.
sentences.chinese: 不過，他計劃組建一種帶正電荷的通道來吸引負離子。

sentences.english: There was an exponential relationship between ANCIC and air relative humidity.
sentences.chinese: 空氣負離子濃度與空氣相對溼度呈指數遞增關係。

sentences.english: Infrared ray and negative ion of bamboo charcoal were tested.
sentences.chinese: 並測試了竹炭的紅外線性能與負離子性能。

sentences.english: Air negative charge ion concentration (ANCIC) has a close relationship with air quality.
sentences.chinese: 空氣負離子濃度與空氣環境質量密切相關。

sentences.english: The addition of hydrogen bromide involves the attachment of an anionic nucleophile in the final step.
sentences.chinese: 溴化氫加成的最後一步，是負離子親核試劑的附加。

sentences.english: The present invention discloses a health neckcloth which can emit anion forever.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種能永久發射負離子的健康領帶。

sentences.english: You start with O double minus, so that is oxygen plus two electrons.
sentences.chinese: 你從氧二負離子，也就是氯元素帶2個負電子。

sentences.english: We can use negative ion tester to measure the concentration of the products.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以用負離子測試儀對產品進行測定。

sentences.english: The structural material has effect on aero-anion concentration.
sentences.chinese: 建築材料對空氣負離子水平也有一定的影響。

definition: variant of 紓壓|纾压[shu1 ya1]
